page.title: 13POLICE AND THEIR JOB
page.content: THE{INCREASE}OF CRIMES FROM JANUARY TO MAY WAS 96. THAT IS THE MAIN THINGS LIKE THEFTS AND STEALING CARS. TWO {PANDA CARS}PATROL ABOUT FOR TWO HOURS, THEN THEY GO BACK TO THE STATION AND SOMEONE ELSE TAKES THEIR CARS OUT ON PATROL. THE POLICE GET{98%}FALSE ALARMS, SO{2}IN{100}ARE REAL CALLS. THE POLICE ARE GIVEN LOTS AND LOTS OF LOST PROPERTY. THERE IS ONE CELL IN BIDEFORD POLICE STATION. IN APRIL THERE WERE{700 CRIMES.}MOST CRIMES ARE COMMITTED AT NIGHT. 5785 CRIMES ARE SOLVED A YEAR. IN BIDEFORD THERE ARE 4 {SERGEANTS}25{POLICE CONSTABLES}A CELL {INSPECTOR}A{CLEANER}AND 3{DETECTIVES AND ALSO A{TYPIST.}WHEN THE POLICE CATCH PEOPLE THEY TAKE A PICTURE OF THEM FACING THE CAMERA AND ONE OF THEIR SIDE TO THE CAMERA. THEY ALSO DO SOME FINGER AND HAND PRINTS OF THE PERSON WITH SPECIAL INK.
